name: iMobiTrax
tag_list: mobile, mobile-marketing, mobile-tracking, mobile-analytics, mobile-advertising, handset-detection, wap, wap-tracking, app-tracking, mobile-apps
overview:
iMobiTrax is a revolutionary, self-hosted application designed specifically to track and optimize campaigns that target mobile devices. With iMobiTrax, merchants, agencies and affiliates will be able to quickly and accurately analyze click data from smart phones, feature phones and tablets, right down to the device, carrier and operating system. This will allow for incredibly accurate post-click optimization, resulting in higher ROIs and increased scalability.

iMobiTrax is a Patent Pending Proprietary mobile tracking platform that tracks device type, device manufacturer and device operating system without the use or need of traffic source tokens. Choose what you want passed as your click subid. You can send a traditional system generated subid, a subid consisting of token data, or both.

Optionally track the ISP/Carrier without the use or need of traffic source tokens. Also includes more mobile tracking options

There is no need to spend hundreds of dollars testing every campaign. With iMobiTrax, you can group and sort your data and immediately see where you are making, or losing, money.
